title: Discussions with govt fails, teachers, principals  continue
paragraphs: Due to the failure of the discussions held with the Education Minister, the teachers and principals trade unions have decided to continue with their strike action, Ceylon's Teachers' Services Unions (CTSU) General Secretary Mahinda Jayasinghe said.
He told the Daily Mirror that the minister did not like to expose the details discussed at the cabinet meeting.
However, not a single demand was fulfilled following discussions with the minister, he said.
Also said that the Minister assured to put another cabinet paper for the next cabinet meeting, he said.
Therefore, the trade unions today have decided to continue to refrain from online teaching practices, Mr Jayasinghe added. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
